pr_title: Update Search module and mock data

timeline.message: Update Search module and mock data to reflect additional attachment properties being added to search2 rest endpoint.

Make thumbnail Attachment property optional

The previous iteration of the thumbsExists method did not return the correct value for custom attachment types that have thumbnails (eg. youtube, flickr). It makes sense to make the Search2 endpoint only return the thumb boolean (now named hasGeneratedThumb) for File-based attachments.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
               * True if an file attachment has a generated thumbnail in filestore
          
          
            
               * True if a file attachment has a generated thumbnail in filestore
